title: Amazon Essentials Women's Jeans, Mid Rise Straight Leg Style, Slim Fit
description: SLIM FIT: Enjoy a close fit through the hip and thigh with ease through the leg for a flattering silhouette. These straight leg jeans for women feature a mid-rise design that sits comfortably below your natural waist for everyday wear.
HIGH STRETCH DENIM: Experience comfort and a nice fit with our cotton-blend denim enhanced with added stretch.
CLASSIC STRAIGHT JEAN: Create versatile outfits with these women's straight leg jeans, a wardrobe essential that offers endless styling options with a modern, slim look.

AUTHENTIC DETAILS: Features traditional five-pocket styling, a zip fly, and a shank button closure. Available in multiple women's jeans sizes, these are great for those seeking a slim straight design in various lengths.
VERSATILE INSEAM OPTIONS: Choose the ideal fit with inseam lengths in Short (28.5"), Regular (30.5"), and Long (32.5").

These women's straight leg jeans are ideal for any occasion, from casual outings to more formal gatherings, making them trendy, versatile pants for women. Offered in a classic medium wash, these women's blue jeans will quickly become a staple in your wardrobe, available in various lengths, including women's jeans short length for a personalized fit. These straight jeans for women feature a refined slim fit through the hip and thigh, with a slight ease through the leg, providing both style and comfort. The high stretch denim adds flexibility, making these jeans great for all-day wear. Suitable for a range of sizes, there's something for everyone. Elevate your wardrobe with these women's straight leg jeans, ideal as casual pants for women or to achieve trendy women's jeans styles.
